## HttpGatewayTimeoutInterceptor class

HttpGatewayTimeoutInterceptor used for intercepting http responses and handling 504 statuses

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HttpGatewayTimeoutInterceptor implements HttpInterceptor 
```
<b>Implements:</b> HttpInterceptor
